direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a string representation of the option, with getKey returning the long option if short is null.
Both methods return a string representation of the option, focusing on different aspects (short vs long).
Both methods handle string inputs and may throw exceptions for invalid inputs.

enhanced_by.reason: The builder method initializes the option, which is a prerequisite for calling getKey.
Setting the long option affects the result of getKey.
The result of getKey can be asserted against the result of getOpt to ensure consistency.
